onboarding_checklist.description: This checklist guides the onboarding of new customers onto DataFlow Solutions’ BI platform, ensuring a seamless 30-day adoption process for 5,000+ customers (customer_analytics.csv). It aligns with our customer-centric mission (employee_handbook.txt, Section 1) and targets 90% completion rate and 4.5/5 satisfaction (customer_support_procedures.md).

onboarding_steps.title: Assign Customer Success Manager (CSM)
onboarding_steps.description: Assign a dedicated CSM based on plan type to guide onboarding (billing_and_pricing.csv). CSM contacts customer within 24 hours.
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1001 (customer_analytics.csv) assigned a CSM for Professional plan onboarding.

onboarding_steps.title: Send Welcome Email
onboarding_steps.description: Provide account setup instructions, login link (app.dataflow.com), and Terms acceptance (terms_of_service.md). Include CSM contact details.
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1002 (customer_analytics.csv) receives Starter plan welcome email.

onboarding_steps.title: Schedule Kickoff Call
onboarding_steps.description: Arrange a 30-minute call to review goals, use cases, and platform overview (training_materials.md). Confirm data source requirements.
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1003 (customer_analytics.csv) schedules Enterprise kickoff call.

onboarding_steps.title: Accept Terms of Service
onboarding_steps.description: Customer accepts Terms via settings.dataflow.com to activate account (terms_of_service.md). Ensure compliance with GDPR/CCPA (privacy_policy.txt).
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1011 (customer_analytics.csv) accepts Terms for Starter plan.

onboarding_steps.title: Complete Account Setup
onboarding_steps.description: Create account, set up 2FA, and invite team members (product_user_guide.md, Section 2). Verify email and configure preferences.
onboarding_steps.success_criteria: Account created, 2FA enabled, 80% team invites sent
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1017 (customer_analytics.csv) sets up 5 users for Starter plan.

onboarding_steps.title: Select Subscription Plan
onboarding_steps.description: Choose Starter, Professional, or Enterprise plan based on needs (billing_and_pricing.csv). CSM reviews plan limits (e.g., API calls).
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1030 (customer_analytics.csv) selects Enterprise plan with custom pricing.

onboarding_steps.title: Configure Data Source Connection
onboarding_steps.description: Connect at least one data source (e.g., MySQL, Salesforce, integration_partners.csv). Follow setup guides and troubleshoot errors (troubleshooting_guide.txt, DS-1001).
onboarding_steps.success_criteria: 1+ data source connected, test query successful
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1001 (customer_analytics.csv) connects Salesforce for sales analytics.

onboarding_steps.title: Create Initial Dashboard
onboarding_steps.description: Build a dashboard using drag-and-drop tools (product_user_guide.md, Section 4.2). CSM provides templates for common use cases (e.g., retail sales).
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1023 (customer_analytics.csv) creates a marketing dashboard.

onboarding_steps.title: Complete Core Training
onboarding_steps.description: Complete recommended tutorials and videos (training_materials.md). Focus on dashboards, data sources, and collaboration (product_user_guide.md, Sections 3–6).
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1015 (customer_analytics.csv) completes healthcare training.

onboarding_steps.title: Set Up API Integration (Optional)
onboarding_steps.description: Configure API for custom workflows (e.g., /dashboards, api_documentation.json). CSM assists with key generation and rate limits (billing_and_pricing.csv).
onboarding_steps.success_criteria: API key generated, test call successful
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1006 (customer_analytics.csv) integrates API for Redshift sync.

onboarding_steps.title: Configure SSO (Enterprise Only)
onboarding_steps.description: Set up SAML 2.0 SSO for secure access (security_policies.txt, Section 3). Requires IT coordination and Okta/Ping integration (integration_partners.csv).
onboarding_steps.success_criteria: SSO enabled, 90% user logins via SSO
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1033 (customer_analytics.csv) configures Okta SSO.

onboarding_steps.title: Set Up White-Labeling (Enterprise Only)
onboarding_steps.description: Customize dashboards with branding (e.g., logos, colors, billing_and_pricing.csv). Use /embed/token for embedding (api_documentation.json).
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1036 (customer_analytics.csv) embeds dashboards in intranet.

onboarding_steps.title: Configure Third-Party Integrations
onboarding_steps.description: Set up integrations (e.g., Google Drive, Zendesk, integration_partners.csv). CSM assists with OAuth and troubleshooting (troubleshooting_guide.txt, INT-7002).
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1015 (customer_analytics.csv) integrates Google Drive for CSV uploads.

onboarding_steps.title: Enable Real-Time Analytics (Professional/Enterprise)
onboarding_steps.description: Configure real-time dashboards and maps (release_notes.json, v2.4.1). Requires streaming data source (e.g., Kafka, system_architecture.md, Section 4).
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1045 (customer_analytics.csv) enables shipment maps.

onboarding_steps.title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
onboarding_steps.description: Test dashboards, integrations, and features for functionality. CSM reviews results and addresses issues (troubleshooting_guide.txt).
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1003 (customer_analytics.csv) completes UAT for 50 dashboards.

onboarding_steps.title: Collect Satisfaction Survey
onboarding_steps.description: Send survey to assess onboarding experience (customer_analytics.csv, Satisfaction_Score). Follow up on scores <3/5 (customer_support_procedures.md, Template 5).
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1008 (customer_analytics.csv) rates onboarding 2/5, followed up by CSM.

onboarding_steps.title: Schedule Quarterly Check-In (Professional/Enterprise)
onboarding_steps.description: Plan ongoing support with quarterly reviews to discuss usage and upsell opportunities (sales_playbook.json, Retention Strategies).
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1030 (customer_analytics.csv) schedules Q3 check-in.

onboarding_steps.title: Provide Ongoing Training Resources
onboarding_steps.description: Share additional training materials for advanced features (training_materials.md). Offer $100/hour training credits (billing_and_pricing.csv).
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1025 (customer_analytics.csv) accesses predictive analytics training.

onboarding_steps.title: Monitor Usage and Churn Risk
onboarding_steps.description: Track usage metrics (e.g., dashboards, API calls, customer_analytics.csv). Identify churn risk (e.g., <20 hours/month) and escalate to CSM (customer_support_procedures.md).
onboarding_steps.success_criteria: Usage report generated, <5% high churn risk
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1002 (customer_analytics.csv) flagged for low usage, CSM intervenes.

onboarding_steps.title: Document Onboarding Completion
onboarding_steps.description: Log completion in Zendesk, update customer_analytics.csv (Churn_Risk, Satisfaction_Score). Share success story with customer (training_materials.md, Case Studies).
onboarding_steps.use_case: Customer 1001 (customer_analytics.csv) completes onboarding, rated 4.8/5.

references.description: Setup guides for account, data sources, dashboards.
